mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO questionnaire
id,
title,
description,
type,
status,
addDate,
addIp,
addUser,
modifyDate,
modifyIp,
modifyUser,
#{id},
#{title},
#{description},
#{type},
#{status},
#{addDate},
#{addIp},
#{addUser},
#{modifyDate},
#{modifyIp},
#{modifyUser},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE questionnaire
id = #{id},
title = #{title},
description = #{description},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
addDate = #{addDate},
addIp = #{addIp},
addUser = #{addUser},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
modifyIp = #{modifyIp},
modifyUser = #{modifyUser},
WHERE id = #{id}
AND modified = #{original}
